message.content:
Dear [Boss’s Name],

I am writing to inform you that I am leaving the company on [Date] due to personal reasons. I will be moving to another city and I will be providing my new homeowner with the necessary keys to my apartment.

I want to thank you for the opportunities I have had at the company, and I am confident that my new homeowner will be impressed with my skills and experience.

Please let me know if there are any additional steps I need to take prior to my departure. I will make sure to inform my new homeowner of my intentions as soon as possible.

Thank you again for the support and trust you have given me. I wish the company continued success in the future.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]]
